definitions.definition: (clothing) To remove or take off, especially of clothing.
To remove or tip a hat, as in greeting, salutation or as a mark of respect.
definitions.example: The rustics doffed their hats at the clergy.

definitions.definition: To get rid of, to throw off.
definitions.example: Doff that stupid idea: it would never work.

definitions.definition: To strip; to divest; to undress.
